summary: Only use perk points on the first level of multi-level perks.  Automatically receive benefits of later levels when you qualify.
descriptionHtml:
Purchase the first rank of any multi-rank perk, and you\'ll get the others when you reach the same skill level that made them available in vanilla.

Ex: purchase Agile Defender, and your armor bonus starts at 20% (like vanilla) upon reaching rank 20 of light armor, the bonus increases to 40%, then 60% at rank 40, 80% at rank 60, and 100% at rank 80.

Original Leveling Perks found here: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16942
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=14881

Note: If importing a character that already has some points invested in multi-level perks, you may experience a doubled-up effect until reaching the next rank. Simply level the skill up to the next rank requirement, or remove the highest achieved rank with the console before activating the mod.

Update 1.6 fixes bugs with Armsman and Augmented spell perks
author: Matope
